cleaned_text: What is Homeopathy? Homeopathy is a 200 year-old system of mind-body medicine developed by the German physician, Samuel Hahnemann. Based on the principle of similars, homeopathy teaches that the best approach to healing involves working with the body's innate self-healing wisdom rather than waging war against it. Homeopathic medicines are chosen in order to match the unique symptom profile of the person and his or her ailments. It is effective in treating simple illnesses like injuries, flu, and coughs, and it can restore health to those suffering from chronic illnesses like migraines, arthritis, anxiety, depression, and much more.
